content: try out this crochet scarf pattern link to video https //youtu be/a-aa_vgjmo0 penguin is not included in the pattern skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches chain chain half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red -yarn needle -scissors final size - length of 23 cm and height of 1 5 cm
